{{Short description|none}}
{{one source|date=May 2021}}
{{further|Ice Lake (microprocessor)}}

== {{anchor|Ice Lake-SP}} "Ice Lake-SP" (10 nm) Scalable Performance ==

* Support for up to 16 [[DIMM]]s of [[DDR4]] memory per CPU socket, maximum 4 TB.
* Supports up to two sockets<ref>{{cite web|url=https://www.anandtech.com/show/16594/intel-3rd-gen-xeon-scalable-review/2|title=Intel 3rd Gen Xeon Scalable (Ice Lake SP) Review: Generationally Big, Competitively Small|work=Anandtech|first=Andrei|last=Frumusanu|date=6 April 2021|access-date=7 April 2021}}</ref>
* PCI Express 4.0 lanes: 64
* -M: Media processing specialized
* -N: Network & NFV specialized
* -P: [[IaaS]] cloud specialized
* -Q: Liquid cooled
* -S: 512 GB [[Intel SGX|SGX]] enclave per CPU
* -T: High thermal-case and extended reliability
* -U: Uniprocessor
* -V: [[SaaS]] cloud specialized
* -Y: Supports Intel {{abbr|SST-PP|Speed Select Technology Power Profile}} 2.0
